esprits.name: Blazeblob
esprits.description: A bouncy fire spirit born from dying embers. Still warm to the touch, though the flame it remembers has long since been extinguished.

esprits.name: Droozle
esprits.description: A chubby water blob that weeps constantly, though it seems quite content. Its tears taste of salt from seas that no longer exist.

esprits.name: Gloomb
esprits.description: A shadowy blob that giggles in empty rooms. Sometimes, if you listen closely, the laughter sounds like it's coming from somewhere else entirely.

esprits.name: Muddroot
esprits.description: A sleepy moss mound that grows tiny flowers when dreams. The petals fall upward, as if remembering a different sky.

esprits.name: Shynix
esprits.description: A gentle spirit that smells of vanilla and old prayers. Its light never quite reaches the corners, as if afraid of what it might illuminate.

esprits.name: Jelune
esprits.description: A restless air spirit that bounces endlessly across water. It cannot stop moving, for stillness brings back the memory of the great calm.

esprits.name: Emberjaw
esprits.description: A tiny cyclops whose burning eye holds fragments of a greater vision. Practices battle stances taught by shadows that no longer cast them.

esprits.name: Crysthide
esprits.description: An ice cyclops whose crystalline hide rings like bells when struck. Apologizes constantly, though none recall what sin it seeks forgiveness for.

esprits.name: Boulderback
esprits.description: A patient earth cyclops whose mushroom crown grows from soil of the first garden. Moves slowly, as if carrying the weight of every step before.

esprits.name: Mistral
esprits.description: A wispy cyclops surrounded by gentle breezes that whisper in languages long forgotten. Floats when excited, remembering when all things were weightless.

esprits.name: Verdiant
esprits.description: A moss-covered cyclops whose eye glows with forest-light. Where it steps, flowers bloom in patterns that spell names no one can read.

esprits.name: Cyghost
esprits.description: A timid cyclops that phases between realms when nervous. Its eye reflects places that exist only in the spaces between heartbeats.

esprits.name: Emberwolf
esprits.description: A young fire wolf whose tail burns with inherited fury. Its flame dims when alone, as if mourning pack-mates lost to the first conflagration.

esprits.name: Thornpup
esprits.description: A forest wolf whose spine grows thorns instead of fur. Chases butterflies down paths that lead deeper into woods that were never planted.

esprits.name: Stormcub
esprits.description: A storm pup whose fur crackles with static memory. Summons rain clouds when playing, unconsciously calling for the tempests that once danced overhead.

esprits.name: Frostpup
esprits.description: An ice-touched wolf whose warm breath forms snow clouds. The puddles it freezes reflect depths far greater than their shallow waters suggest.

esprits.name: Shadowcub
esprits.description: A dark wolf pup that wags its tail at compliments. Born in gentle darkness, it knows not why others flee from shadows.

esprits.name: Glowpup
esprits.description: A wolf cub whose golden fur heals wounds it cannot see. Its embarrassed glow brightens when it accidentally mends things meant to stay broken.

esprits.name: Frostcrag
esprits.description: A hulking ice creature carved from the first glacier. Moves with grace learned from watching water flow before the great freezing began.

esprits.name: Mossback
esprits.description: An ancient forest guardian whose bark-hide hosts creatures from an earlier age. Flowers bloom on its shoulders with the seasons of a world that stopped turning.

esprits.name: Cinderbolt
esprits.description: Living flame given focus and rage. Its fiery fists leave scorch marks that glow for hours, as if the stone itself remembers burning.

esprits.name: Geargrind
esprits.description: A bronze construct from the age when storms were harnessed. Hums with electrical songs that once powered cities beneath the eternal tempest.

esprits.name: Voidstone
esprits.description: Crystallized shadow that drinks light from the air. Its footsteps make no sound, for it walks in the spaces between moments.

esprits.name: Prismheart
esprits.description: A gentle giant whose crystal body refracts hope itself. Its rainbow light dances on walls that once housed the chambers of the lost sanctum.

esprits.name: Pyraxis
esprits.description: Crimson scales shimmer with inner heat, and her broad wings spread like molten metal. Old scars crisscross her hide, each one telling of battles fought in places where fire itself was contested.

esprits.name: Azurewing
esprits.description: Crystalline blue scales catch and refract light like frozen storm clouds. Her elegant wings move through air that tastes of lightning, and thunder follows her flight with respectful distance.

esprits.name: Glacivern
esprits.description: Ice-white scales form patterns older than winter itself. Her breath has grown strange with age - where once it merely froze, now it preserves moments in crystalline amber that will never thaw.

esprits.name: Stormbreaker
esprits.description: Dark purple scales drink in light until even her shadow seems too bright. Lightning crackles between her claws, but the thunder that should follow never comes - swallowed by the silence she carries.

esprits.name: Thornwarden
esprits.description: Living bark has grown over her green scales, and moss spreads across her wings in patterns that hurt to study too closely. Where she nests, the forest grows wild and remembers things it should have forgotten.

esprits.name: Radiara
esprits.description: Golden scales pulse with inner radiance, each one reflecting light that seems to come from somewhere else entirely. She closes her eyes when she speaks, as if her own brightness pains her to witness.

esprits.name: Ruby
esprits.description: Crimson hair flows beneath spiked black armor, and twin curved blades gleam with inner fire. Her horned helm bears scorch marks that seem to shift when unobserved.

esprits.name: Luna
esprits.description: Beneath her wide-brimmed hat, silver hair catches static sparks. The arcane wheel floating beside her spins without regard for physics or reason.

esprits.name: Nerida
esprits.description: Golden ornaments adorn her flowing robes, while a compass-like mandala floats behind her. Water droplets rise from the ground around her feet, defying gravity.

esprits.name: Morticia
esprits.description: Elegant in dark robes that seem to drink in light, she carries a blade that cuts through more than flesh. Where she steps, warmth quietly dies.

esprits.name: Rose
esprits.description: Thorned armor grows from her very skin, blooming with roses that wilt at the touch of anything false. Her beauty conceals defenses sharper than steel.

esprits.name: Aurora
esprits.description: Long blonde hair frames a face that has seen too much truth. Her silver blade gleams with light that reveals the honesty in all things, willing or not.

esprits.name: Voria
esprits.description: Purple robes cascade around her elegant form, while a spiked mandala of light hovers behind her. Her staff burns with precise, geometric flames.

esprits.name: Storia
esprits.description: Crowned with a thorned halo of crackling energy, her teal dress flows as if caught in perpetual wind. Lightning dances between her fingertips.

esprits.name: Oceania
esprits.description: Behind her flows an ornate halo like frozen waves, and her aquamarine robes ripple with the memory of deep currents. Water pearls form in the air around her staff.

esprits.name: Verdinia
esprits.description: Dark wings spread beneath a jagged shadow-halo, and thorns grow from the fabric of her gown itself. Where she stands, the ground grows cold and still.

esprits.name: Sylvanna
esprits.description: Green-crowned and framed by a living mandala of thorns, she tends to knowledge that grows like vines through the spaces between words.

esprits.name: Lumensis
esprits.description: Radiant light forms an intricate halo behind her silver-white form, casting shadows that reveal more than illuminate. Her presence makes lies visible to the naked eye.

esprits.name: Pyroclasm
esprits.description: A figure draped in flowing dark wings edged with molten orange. Her branching horns glow like embers, and the air shimmers with heat that has no source.

esprits.name: Tempesta
esprits.description: Her golden antlers crackle with static, and wing-like appendages ripple as if caught in perpetual wind. Even in stillness, she seems to be moving.

esprits.name: Thalassa
esprits.description: Azure-haired and draped in flowing blue-black wings that seem to hold the depth of oceans. Water droplets form and fall from nothing around her feet.

esprits.name: Nethys
esprits.description: Cloaked in wing-like shadows that absorb all light, her horned silhouette wavers as if reality itself is uncertain of her presence.

esprits.name: Lumina
esprits.description: Silver-winged and crowned with elegant horns, she emanates a light so pure it reveals flaws in everything it touches, including the air itself.

esprits.name: Rosalia
esprits.description: Rose-crowned and wrapped in dark wings touched with pink, tiny flowers bloom and wither in her footsteps without soil or seed.
